name: Alvin Christian
description:
Enjoy reading, enjoy most .sports.
Looking forward to meeting that special someone whom would enjoy being passionately spoiled and will reciprocate., I want a Woman I can trust so I can exhale,enjoy life’s simple pleasures. Belive me I’ll have your back. Not looking to marry any Woman needing green card.
I’m financially secure, I love my job very much cos it puts food on my table.
I’m a one woman man and I’m looking for the same in my partner, the woman i will enjoy the rest of my life with to the fullest…Just like everyone on this site I’m looking for someone to build a relationship and to share life’s adventures with
Also, please read my profile thoroughly. I am 58 years very healthy….
